titles.title: You'd Better Make Up Your Mind To Go On

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You'd better make up your mind to go on
You'd better make up your mind to surrender your all
You'd better make up your mind to pay the price
You'd better make up your mind to go on.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've made up my mind to go on
I've made up my mind to surrender your all
I've made up my mind to pay the price
I've made up my mind to go on.
